item.title: Behind the Build - Automated Blog Generator
item.description: A detailed breakdown of how I automated InfinityIT’s blog publishing workflow using n8n, OpenAI, and WordPress — improving consistency, reducing cost, and maintaining brand quality at scale.

item.title: Behind the Build - InfinityIT Desktop Overlay
item.description: A detailed account of the development process behind the InfinityIT Desktop Overlay, focusing on design, implementation, and iterative improvements.
